title: So Many Fish
description: Fish can be many different colors, shapes, and sizes. They do have one thing in common, though: they all live in the water. So Many Fish provides students with a closer look at some of these amazing animals. The book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge and compare and contrast information.
meta: bright, fancy, scary, shiny, spotted, striped
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Short Vowel Sounds : Identify short /i/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words fish, is, this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
